text: Ma qey tu nabini? Ku bi rasti Yezdan ewran pev dixe, pase ewan (wusa) dicivine (nava wan ewran da valati nahele) pase (ewan ewran) li ser hev deste deste digevese, idi tu dibini ku barist ji wan (ewran) dibare. Ji wan ewren jor da weki ciya hene, ji wan da xilolilk (u barist) dibare. idi ewa (ziyana ke bive) ewe zipike li candina wi dixe (Yezdan we zipike ji candina wane ku ziyana wan nevaye) dide fetilandine; (Ewan berqetave ku ji wan ewran derdikebin) nezik dibe ku tireja wan (ruhnaya) cavan behere
